Manx: Padjer ayns Gaelg: Choud’s T’ou Spaarail Mee er yn Ooir.
English: A Prayer in Manx: Whilst You Spare Me on the Earth.
Diplomatic: Padjer ayns galg:

Manx: Choud’s T’ou spaarail mee er yn ooir,
English: Whilst You spare me on the earth,
Diplomatic: Chouds tow spaarraill mee er yn ooir

Manx: Dy yannoo Dt’aigney cur dou pooar,
English: To do Your will, give me power,
Diplomatic: Dy yannoo d’aigney cur daue pooar

Manx: O Uss, ta Chiarn erskyn dagh nhee,
English: O Thee, who art Lord above every thing,
Diplomatic: O uss ta Chiarn erskin dagh nhee

Manx: Jean glenney smooinaghtyn my chree.
English: Purify the thoughts of my heart.
Diplomatic: Jean glenney smooinaghtyn my chree

Manx: Cha vel mee jeean dy yeeaghyn seose,
English: I am not diligent to look upward,
Diplomatic: Cha vel mee jean dy yeeaghy seose

Manx: Ny-yeigh jean cur yn bannaght neose,
English: Yet, send your blessing down,
Diplomatic: Ny-yeigh jean cur yn bannaght neose

Manx: Niee mee ayns fuill deyr Yeesey Chreest,
English: Wash me in Jesus Christ’s dear blood,
Diplomatic: Nhiee mee ayns fuill deyr Yeesey Chreest

Manx: Nish ayns e vyghin as erreeish.
English: Now, in his mercy and compassion.
Diplomatic: Nish ayns sy vyghyn as erreeish

Manx: Gow ass my vree dagh nhee neughlen,
English: Take out of my essence every impure thing,
Diplomatic: Gow as my vhree dagh nhee nughlen

Manx: As cur dagh olkys magh ass shen,
English: And take every wickedness out of that,
Diplomatic: As chur dagh olkys magh as shen

Manx: Ta mee goaill rish my oiljyn Hiarn,
English: Yet, I accept my faults, O, Lord,
Diplomatic: Ta mee ghoaill rish my oyljyn Hiarn

Manx: Ny-yeih trooid Chreest er gerrey tayrn.
English: Through Christ, who draws near.
Diplomatic: Ny-yeih trooid Chreest ergerrey tarn

Manx: Çheet nish trooid Chreest gys stoyl dy grayse,
English: Coming now, through Christ, to a throne of grace,
Diplomatic: Cheet nish trooid Chreest gys stooal dy graase

Manx: Ga dy vel mee fo deyrey baase,
English: Even though I am under deadly condemnation,
Diplomatic: Gha dy vell me fo deyrey baase

Manx: T’Eh nish ec Dty laue yesh ayns gloyr,
English: He  is now at Your right hand in glory,
Diplomatic: Te nish eck dy laue yesh ayns gloyr

Manx: Agh er E ghraih jean cur dou foayr.
English: But, for His love give me favour.
Diplomatic: Agh er y ghraih jean cur dow fooar
Nagh vell e raayt ayn ghoo dy graase

Manx: Nagh vel eh raait ayns yn Goo dy ghrayse,
English: Is it not said in the Word of grace,

Manx: Nagh vel ayd’s taitnys ayns my vaase,
English: You have not pleasure in my death,
Diplomatic: Nagh vell ayds taitnys ayns my vaase

Manx: O cur yn gooit dy chredjue dooys,
English: O, Give to me the gift of faith,
Diplomatic: O cur yn gooit dy credjue dooys

Manx: Dy voddym shaghney Dty ymmoose.
English: That I may avoid Your wrath.
Diplomatic: Dy voddym shaghney dy yimmoose
Er coointey oural dy Vac hene

Manx: Er coontey oural Dty Vac hene,
English: On account of your own Son’s sacrifice,
Diplomatic: Nish ghow yn whing dy feccah jee’m

Manx: Nish gow yn whing dy pheccah jee’m,
English: Now take the yoke of sin off me,

Manx: Ayns oural Chreest ta my hreishteil,
English: My trust is in the sacrifice of Christ,
Diplomatic: Ayns oural Chreest ta my chreeisteill

Manx: Ta kinjagh son my annym prayal.
English: Who constantly prays for my soul.
Diplomatic: Ta kinjagh son my annym preeayl
Clash rish yn uill ta pooaral loayrt

Manx: Clasht rish yn uill ta pooaral loayrt,
English: Hear the blood that powerfully speaks,
Diplomatic: As er y ghraih jean bannagh churt

Manx: As er E ghraih jean bannaght choyrt,
English: And for his Love give a blessing,
Diplomatic: Yn Spyrryd Noo dy reill my chree

Manx: Yn Spyrryd Noo dy reill my chree,
English: The Holy Spirit to keep my heart,

Manx: As jannoo mish my vac dy Yee.
English: And make me a son of God.
Diplomatic: As jannoo mish my vac dy Yee
Dy chur dow tushtey cooie jee’d Hene

Manx: Dy chur dou tushtey cooie jee’d Hene,
English: To gove me proper knowledge of Yourself,
Diplomatic: As eiyragh mayrt ayns yn vea veeayn

Manx: As eiraght mayrt ayns yn vea veayn,
English: And inheritence with you in eternal life,
Diplomatic: Dy voddym aynyds ve ec fea

Manx: Dy voddym Aynyd’s ve ec fea,
English: That I may be, within you, at peace,
Diplomatic: As veih dy chooilley feccah chea

Manx: As veih dy chooilley pheccah çhea.
English: And flee from every sin.

Manx: O Yeesey cur dou grayse as shee,
English: O, Jesus, give me grace and peace
Diplomatic: O yeesey cur dow graase as shee

Manx: As skeayl yn ghraih Ayd ayns my chree,
English: And spread Your love in my heart
Diplomatic: As skeayl yn ghraih ayd ayns my chree

Manx: Ta mish my pheccaghyn goaill rish,
English: I admit my sins
Diplomatic: Ta mish my feccaghyn ghoaill rish

Manx: Agh er Dty oural folley nish.
English: But on your blood sacrifice now.
Diplomatic: Agh er dy oural folley nish

Manx: My Hiarn ta slane my varrantys,
English: My Lord, who art my complete assurance,
Diplomatic: My Hiarn ta slane my varrantys

Manx: Coadee mee ayns Dty ynrickys,
English: Protect me in Your uprightness
Diplomatic: Coaddee mee ayns dy ynrickys

Manx: O gow ersooyl dagh fritlag loau,
English: O, take away every rotten rag,
Diplomatic: O ghow ersooyl dagh fritlag lhou

Manx: Pishooyn ta coyrt my annym mow.
English: Poisons that bring destruction to my soul.
Diplomatic: Pishooyn ta curt my annym mow

Manx: As gow mee myr dy beagh er laue,
English: And take me as though by the hand,
Diplomatic: As ghow mee mor dy bagh er laue

Manx: As leeid mee ayns yn raad gys Niau,
English: And lead me in the way to Heaven,
Diplomatic: As leeid mee ayns yn raaid gys Niau

Manx: Ayns shen dy ve dy bragh ec fea,
English: To be there forver at peace,
Diplomatic: Ayns shen dy ve dy braagh eck fea

Manx: Voish seihll dy coshey croymmey sheese.
English: From a world of ???
Diplomatic: Voish seihll dy coshey croamey sheese

Manx: Hiarn, ta mee yeearree dy chur booise,
English: Lord, I yearn to give thanks,
Diplomatic: Hiarn t amee yeerree dy chur booise

Manx: As ooashlagh Uss ta reill dy braa,
English: And worship You, who rules forever,
Diplomatic: As wooashlagh Uss ta reill dy braa

Manx: Erson Dty ghraih nagh vel caghlaa,
English: For your Love, that never changes,
Diplomatic: Erson dy ghraih nagh vell caghlaa

Manx: O Uss va marroo, Agh nish bio.
English: O You who were dead, But now alive.
Diplomatic: O Uss va marroo, Agh nish bio

Manx: Choud’s ta mee liorish Dty Spyyryd mie,
English: Whilst I am beside Your good Spirit,
Diplomatic: Chouds ta mee liorish dy Spyyryd mie

Manx: Gys ver Oo lhesh mee sauçhey thie,
English: Until you bring me safely home,
Diplomatic: Gys ver Oo lhesh mee sauechey thie

Manx: Dy ve mayrt Hene sy çheer gloyroil,
English: To be with You Yourself in the glorious land,
Diplomatic: Dy ve mayrt Hene sy cheer gloyrrooyl

Manx: As croamey ec Dty Stoyl Reeoyl,
English: And bowing at Your Royal Throne.
Diplomatic: As croamey eck dy Stoal Reeoyl

Manx: Ayns eunysyn ta fegooish kione,
English: In delights that are without end
Diplomatic: Ayns eunysyn ta fegoish kione

Manx: Marish Dty Ainleyn, as Dty chloan.
English: With Your Angels, and Your children.
Diplomatic: Marish dy Ainleyn, as dy chloan.

Manx: Scruit; yn çheyoo laa yeig jeh yn vee s’jerree jeh’n geurey, 1900.
English: Written; the sixteenth of January, 1900.
Diplomatic: Scrieut yn sheoo laa yeih jeh yn vee skerree jeh’n geurey 1900

Manx: Farquhar
English: Farquhar
Diplomatic: Farquhar
